html:
11.8.20  7:14 pm   can you seriously give a straight answer no bs or games no foolin around in a lighthearted and sarcastic tone

      sure

11.8.20  7:06 pm   whats your opinion on airports 2020

      never heard of them

11.8.20  6:34 pm   Thoughts on grass?

      the most relaxing thing is that you don't have to actually count the individual strands for them all to be there

11.8.20  6:12 pm   How did you develop your style of music?

      not sure, but i'm still developing it

11.8.20  5:52 pm   do you make songs

      how did you know

11.8.20  5:47 pm   What is your favorite word and why?

      one weird trick which doctors HATE is to use many different words together

11.8.20  5:34 pm   What's your favorite recipe?

      patterns

11.8.20  5:12 pm   your go-to order at your favorite restaurant?

      i forgot about restaurants

11.8.20  4:47 pm   Do you have any tips for someone just learning to play guitar?

     no

     I can't get my hand to wrap around the neck correctly for a c chord and ive been trying for months.

     maybe you could try a smaller guitar

11.8.20  4:25 pm   How are you (or were you in the past half year) spending your days during the corona situation?

     video techniques developments, then, finally, doing the first of many videos which happens to be a music (song) video

     Has the virus changed something important?

     it completely altered the social fabric of the entire globe

11.8.20  4:25 pm   Is your next song about velcro

      no

11.8.20  4:16 pm   What style of creating do you enjoying more. Creating many short videos or spending lots of time on one longer video.

      i hate both. what i would rather be doing is spend a reasonable amount of time on reasonable sized videos

11.8.20  4:08 pm   Soap broke my laptop, what should I use to fix it

      you might have to return to the lords who created it, on bended knee

11.8.20  3:41 pm   What is your opinion on modern... Things?

      they have a certain newness to them which is just unmistakable

11.8.20  3:39 pm   do you think cloning yourself 2-13 times would make the video creation process easier or harder?

      the same, but it would make my life much weirder

11.8.20  3:14 pm   Should we be concerned about your mysterious leave?

      you can if you want. basically the way my brain works is i have no way to stop myself from thinking i can do everything. over time i've developed better and better coping tools, but, at the same time i also get better and better at thinking i can do everything. this has always created enormous logistical problems for me, and it's crushed me many times and yet i have also overcome it many times. so we'll see what happens

11.8.20  3:11 pm   Where are you in your journey ?

      large logistically insurmountable wall, which probably won't stop me because it never did before

11.8.20  2:39 pm   What do you think about the "associating the art with the artist" debate?

     never heard of it

     What's your take on it? Do you think music listeners should consider the philosophies of a musician before supporting/even listening to their music?

     they can if they want, but, in some cases how would they even know

11.8.20  2:11 pm   new music when?

      every other tuesday, if all goes well

11.8.20  1:09 pm   when is your bed time

      2:40 pm

11.8.20  12:01 pm   What's your favorite shape

      dot

11.8.20  11:41 am   i just spent an hour looking at toothpastes....... 

      sounds like you are ready to take it to the next level

11.8.20  10:22 am   In your video about the adventure with education you said you would have Velcro in a different video. Is the next video going to contain that velcro?

     probably not

      Very interested.

11.8.20  9:21 am   how many snakes can a frog legally own?

      none

11.8.20  8:43 am   Who's the best person in the world

      it's a tie

11.8.20  7:45 am   Bill, what is your opinion on birds?

      they are a close cousin of other birds

     Do you have a favrotie bird?

     no

11.8.20  6:35 am   Are you god in disguise

      i thought you were

11.8.20  5:36 am   Could you write a quick poem for us?

      i've written so many, but nonetheless i will continue to write more

11.8.20  4:36 am   Can you give us the title of the big project your working on? (if your still working on it)

      the big project i'm working on, if you can call it a big project, is called making songs and videos for the rest of my life. as part of that project (if you'd like to call it a project, but i normally don't), i am working on a video for a song. which shouldn't really be big enough to be called a project. but i guess that's part of the contention that i have with myself

11.8.20  3:28 am   What world do you live in

      1 and 2, superpositioned on top of each other in a quantum type of manner

11.8.20  2:52 am   How do you get song ideas??

      they usually hit me in the face when i least expect. the secret is to develop fast enough reflexes to catch them

11.8.20  1:46 am   What is the expected day of release of your new video (≧▽≦)

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

11.8.20  12:58 am   What's your favorite song that you've made

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.8.20  12:41 am   does the narrator of "the Moon is made of Cheese but i can't taste it" have COVID, which has lack of taste as a symptom?

      that seems impossible because that song was written in 2018

11.8.20  12:33 am   what do you think that will happen in 2021

      it's up to you

11.7.20  11:30 pm   What does bpm stand for?

      beats per minute

11.7.20  11:07 pm   Do you ultimately feel as though you are making art with the intention of inspiring others or are you just doing your thing and having a good time with it?

      good times are inspiring. there's pretty much no way around that

11.7.20  10:21 pm   what if you came up with arbitrary limits while writing/recording a song, e.g. only vocals, piano, and drums?

      that sounds lovely

11.7.20  10:19 pm   what is the most regular thing you've ever seen?

      a leaf

11.7.20  10:12 pm   would you ever give a ted talk

      sure

11.7.20  9:44 pm   Where did you come from?

      the regular place

11.7.20  9:33 pm   do you draw inspiration from some of the wacky questions here?

     i don't recall ever receiving a wacky question

      if so why do we drive in a parkway and park in a driveway?

     coincidence

      mcuh love and confusion

11.7.20  9:13 pm   How are your answers on and off topic at the same time

      just trying to get a feel for the space

11.7.20  8:50 am   how do I motivate myself to practice an instrument?

      why do you want to

11.7.20  8:49 pm   any suggestion on what to paint?

      the world

11.7.20  8:09 pm   what inspired ye to start music

      i don't remember but i'm pretty sure it was music. at least that is what inspires me to continue doing it again and again

11.7.20  7:29 pm   How long until your next vid? 

      doing it now

11.7.20  7:18 pm   Are Droids worthy of music?

      i've never heard of droids but yes

11.7.20  6:40 pm   When's the next video

      right away

11.7.20  5:47 pm   if handel's hallelujah, cohen's hallelujah, and your hallelujah were in the olympics, which would win?

      one of the african ones
